com.mysql.fabric

Class ShardMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mysql.fabric.ShardMapping
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HashShardMapping, RangeShardMapping

    public abstract class ShardMapping
extends java.lang.Object
    A shard mapping representing this set of sharded data.
